person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Saturday 's national congress of the ruling Czech Civic Democratic Party ( ODS ) will discuss making the party more efficient and transparent , Foreign Minister and ODS vice-chairman Josef Zieleniec , said on Friday .

Let's think step by step.

| Person     |
|------------|
| Saturday   |
| the ruling Czech Civic Democratic Party (ODS) |
| Mr. Josef Zieleniec |

Note: I have identified "Saturday" as a person because in some contexts, it can be personified. However, it is not a person in the traditional sense. The other clear "Person" entities are "the ruling Czech Civic Democratic Party (ODS)" and "Mr. Josef Zieleniec".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person     |
|------------|
| Mr. Josef Zieleniec |

Note: The only clear "Person" entity in the paragraph is "Mr. Josef Zieleniec". The other entities, "Saturday" and "the ruling Czech Civic Democratic Party (ODS)", do not clearly refer to a person.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Saturday 's national congress of the ruling Czech Civic Democratic Party ( ODS ) will discuss making the party more efficient and transparent , Foreign Minister and ODS vice-chairman Josef Zieleniec , said on Friday .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| ruling Czech Civic Democratic Party (ODS) |
| ODS |
| Foreign Minister and ODS vice-chairman Josef Zieleniec's party (ODS) |

Explanation:

1. "ruling Czech Civic Democratic Party (ODS)" is an organization.
2. "ODS" is mentioned again later in the paragraph, which is also an organization.
3. "Foreign Minister and ODS vice-chairman Josef Zieleniec's party (ODS)" is referring to the same organization, but it is presented in a different way, so I included it as a separate entity to ensure completeness.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| ruling Czech Civic Democratic Party (ODS) |
| ODS |

Explanation:

1. "ruling Czech Civic Democratic Party (ODS)" is an organization.
2. "ODS" is mentioned again later in the paragraph, which is also an organization.

The other mention of "ODS" in the context of "Foreign Minister and ODS vice-chairman Josef Zieleniec" is not an organization by itself, but rather refers to the organization mentioned earlier. Therefore, it is not included as a separate entity.
